greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Length of longest palindromic subword of (n base 5).
link: Robert Israel, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
maple: for n from nL to 1 by -1 do
for i from 1 to nL-n+1 do
if L[i..i+n-1] = ListTools:-Reverse(L[i..i+n-1]) then return n fi
results.author: _Clark Kimberling_
